question: What type of cap or net did you use?
Please specify details about electrode placement.
Type of electrodes
choices: passive Ag/Ag-Cl | passive tin | active electrodes (with preamplifiers) | active dry | passive dry | other

question: Make or brand of the amplifier
Source of the triggers
choices: photo diode | auditory trigger/voice key | combination stim tracker | presentation software trigger

question: Describe your trigger signal input.
details: 1. If your system delivers triggers online during the acquisition of EEG to the amp, e.g., via a parallel port, serial port, or TCP/IP select option 1.  2. If your system delivers triggers online during the acquisition of EEG to the amp via a USB port (including serial port over USB (e.g., arduino, LabJack U3, or similar)) or another digital signal format select option 2.  3 & 4 - if the triggers are not delivered to amplifiers, but to the acquisition computer, select the appropriate option 3 or 4 depending on whether the trigger is transfered using an analogue (e.g. parallel port) or digital (e.g. USB) channel  6. If triggers are added after the recording (e.g. after analysis of an audio recording of spoken responses), select option 6.    Please provide specific details in the Further Clarification field.
choices: 1. analogue signal to amplifier | 2. digital signal to amplifier | 3. analogue signal to acquisition software | 4. digital signal to acquisition software | 5. combined stimulus delivery/acquisition software | 6. offline triggers
